index.title: AOSC Portal
index.float_banner:
Most of the good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid
or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program -- Linus Torvalds
index.welcome: Welcome to Anthon Open Source Community! We are a group of free and open technology enthusiasts working hard for improvements.

about_page.credits_h2: GET TO KNOW ABOUT US AND THOSE TO THANK FOR
about_page.col-sm-6:
Believe it or not, AOSC has been around for quite some time now, we do
want more people to know about us, and those who we are grateful to.
AOSC will never take its shape today without the support from our lovely
community and our generous sponsors.

admin.h2: DID YOU REALLY NAME YOUR SON Robert'); DROP TABLE Students;--?

easter.title: If you see this, plz tell @Lion
easter.tag_a: @Lion is trying to describe himself, although it shouldn't be done in this way.

projects_page.subtitle: Not just another brick in the wall.
projects_page.desc:
AOSC is not just a community for a Linux distribution, our community
holds a bucketful of F/OSS goodness developed by us, and maintained
for you. Here you will find information regarding using, hacking, or
even ways to contribute to our community's finest.

news_page.subtitle: Read hard, get it all caught up :-D
news_page.desc:
Things are (actually) going on around the community (surprise!), you may
find latest news and happenings in and around the community, and of
course, latest information for you to better enjoy AOSC OS.

community_page.subtitle: Some latest intelligence about this group of Homo sapiens.
community_page.desc:
Here you will find information about our latest and future community
activities. AOSCC (Anthon Open Source Community Conference) for example,
is our annual get-together where developers and friends of the community
talk about the past and the coming year, and having fun hacking,
or... not hacking.

downloads.subtitle: /* I don't know how it works, it just works. */
